dct_title_s: The kingdoms of Spain and Portugal : compiled & reduced from numerous topographic surveys, the maritime surveys of Don Vicente Tofino, &c.
dct_alternative_sm: The kingdoms of Spain and Portugal : compiled & reduced from numerous topographic surveys, the maritime surveys of Don Vicente Tofino, &c.
dct_description_sm: London, Published 1st January 1823, by Richard H. Laurie, No. 53, Fleet Street.; Relief shown by hachures.; Three scale bars: British statute miles -- Spanish leagues -- Portugese leagues.
